content:
You're welcome! I'm thrilled to have been able to help. It's always exciting to discover a potentially valuable and rare piece, and I'm sure you're eager to learn more about your vase.

Remember to approach the process with patience and diligence, and don't hesitate to ask questions or seek additional opinions. The more you know about your vase, the better equipped you'll be to make informed decisions about its care, conservation, and potential sale.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'll be here to help. Good luck with your research, and I hope you uncover more fascinating secrets about your beautiful Meissen vase!

(And don't forget to handle your vase with care and attention – it might just be a priceless treasure!)
